mapper.insert: insert into report (reportNum, reportType, fromUserNum, toUserNum, reason) values (#{reportNum}, #{reportType}, #{fromUserNum}, #{toUserNum}, #{reason})
mapper.select: select R.*, FU.username as fromUserName, TU.username as toUserName, TU.enabled from report R left join user FU on (R.fromUserNum = FU.userNum) left join user TU on (R.toUserNum = TU.userNum) order by reportNum desc
